# remoteStorageTexture

**Instance Property**

The texture on another GPU that the texture was created from, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
var remoteStorageTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is non-`nil`, it contains a reference to the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture] instance that created this texture. If the texture isn’t a remote view, the value of this property is `nil`.

You can use remote views only as the source for copy commands encoded by an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBlitCommandEncoder].

## Creating views of textures on other GPUs

- **makeRemoteTextureView(_:)**: Creates a remote texture view for another GPU in the same peer group.

items.description: Creates a remote texture view for another GPU in the same peer group.
